meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a small, geometric pattern resembling the eye of a bird.
meanings.sent1: The dress was made of birdseye fabric, with tiny birdseye patterns all over.
meanings.sent2: She chose a shirt with a subtle birdseye design for the party.
meanings.sent3: The birdseye fabric made the curtains look like a flock of tiny birds.
meanings.sent4: The birdseye pattern on the tablecloth seemed to watch over the dinner guests.
meanings.sent5: The birdseye fabric felt soft and delicate to the touch.

meanings.definition: A view or perspective from a high vantage point, as if seen from the eyes of a bird.
meanings.sent1: From the birdseye view of the mountain, the entire valley was visible.
meanings.sent2: The drone captured a stunning birdseye shot of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The birdseye perspective from the hot air balloon was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: The birdseye view of the stadium showed the crowd like tiny ants.
meanings.sent5: The birdseye sight from the cliff edge was both thrilling and peaceful.
